sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_snc_nnemc0_gwbs"> <x_snc_nnemc0_gwbs action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <definition>The initial training services, devices, accessories, aids, equipment, and parts used to establish and facilitate initial instruction of personnel to operate and maintain the system with maximum efficiency directly associated with a Prime Mission Product. This does not include installation training included in 3.4.3, System Turnover or Training & Manning (after IOC). This element is a roll-up of costs associated with lower levels.</definition> <number>GWBS0001411</number> <parent_task display_value="3 Common Elements">af158176db91a3008e9357935e96197d</parent_task> <sys_class_name>x_snc_nnemc0_gwbs</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>jnyika</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2018-10-25 15:59:55</sys_created_on> <sys_id>e7158176db91a3008e9357935e96199d</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>jnyika</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2018-10-25 16:50:49</sys_updated_on> <task_code>3.9</task_code> <task_name>3.9 Initial Training (Train the Trainer)</task_name> <task_title>Initial Training (Train the Trainer)</task_title> </x_snc_nnemc0_gwbs> </record_update>
